DFr_944B583F.Text.Text: We’re talking about John Stuart Mill in class today!

DFr_944B583F.Text.Context: Flow/kitchen/02_ari: "We’re talking about John Stuart Mil..."

DFr_2AAA3D0B.Text.Text: Oh! ^^^^Wait, ^^^I think I know. ^^^^^^^He’s a comedian, ^^^^^right?

DFr_9C1E76F2.Text.Text: He’s brilliant. ^^^Opened up my eyes to a new way to view the world.

DFr_8D45D2A2.Text.Text: Were you paying attention to ANYTHING I just said?

DFr_8D45D2A2.Text.Context: Flow/kitchen/02_ari: "Were you paying attention to ANYTHI..."

DFr_4EDB2B8D.Text.Text: Oh, someone’s at the door! ^^^You can tell me about this later, okay?

DFr_4EDB2B8D.Text.Context: Flow/kitchen/01_socrates: "Oh, someone’s at the door! ^^^You c..."

DFr_F9252347.Text.Text: Well hurry up! ^^^I have school in half an hour!

DFr_F9252347.Text.Context: Flow/kitchen/02_ari: "Well hurry up! ^^^I have school in..."

DFr_C1776DEC.Text.Text: (My name is Socrates Jones. ^^^^^^^^Everyone in my family seems to care about philosophy... ^^^^^^^^but I could never really get into it.)

DFr_323ACB50.Text.Text: (I’m just an accountant, after all. ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^Why should I care about the nature of right and wrong?)

DFr_323ACB50.Text.Context: Flow/kitchen/01_socrates: "(I’m just an accountant, after all...."

DFr_A30AF716.Text.Text: The name’s Billy, ^^^^^Billy the Salesman! ^^^^^^^^^I was travelin’ this country selling my wares, ^^^^when I saw your shabby apartment and instantly knew: ^^^^^^^^

DFr_C16A45C0.Text.Text: There lives a man who appreciates a good deal!

DFr_C16A45C0.Text.Context: Flow/hallway/03_billy: "There lives a man who appreciates a..."

DFr_AF766384.Text.Text: How would you like to hear about the fabulous bargains I have for you today?

DFr_AF766384.Text.Context: Flow/hallway/03_billy: "How would you like to hear about th..."

DFr_58033B58.Text.Text: Oh... ^^^I’m sorry, ^^^I have to take my daughter— ^^^^^^

DFr_2CF747E0.Text.Text: The name’s Billy, ^^^Billy the Salesman! ^^^^^^^I was travelin’ this country selling my wares, ^^^^^when I saw— ^^^^^

DFr_E15BB01B.Text.Text: Doesn’t mean I can’t be bored. ^^^^^^^^^^

DFr_E15BB01B.Text.Context: Flow/hallway/02_ari: "Doesn’t mean I can’t be bored. ^^^^..."

DFr_4E2495F6.Text.Text: Yes, yes. ^^^^^^^Listen, Billy, ^^^^I’m sorry, but I really don’t want— ^^^^^

DFr_C6AB7C91.Text.Text: I think we should hear him out.

DFr_C6AB7C91.Text.Context: Flow/hallway/02_ari: "I think we should hear him out."

DFr_C6830013.Text.Text: If you don’t bother to at least listen, ^^^^^^you aren’t going to get anywhere.

DFr_C6830013.Text.Context: Flow/hallway/02_ari: "If you don’t bother to at least lis..."

DFr_A3585D26.Text.Text: I have a great product for you!

DFr_A3585D26.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p1/03_billy: "I have a great product for you!"

DFr_33262E15.Text.Text: You need my product to do what it does!

DFr_33262E15.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p1/03_billy: "You need my product to do what it d..."

DFr_65D793CF.Text.Text: You don’t want those pests around!

DFr_65D793CF.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p1/03_billy: "You don’t want those pests around!"

DFr_28500B29.Text.Text: And that’s what I’ve got for y’all!

DFr_28500B29.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p1/03_billy: "And that’s what I’ve got for y’all!"

DFr_95E842EC.Text.Text: I have a great product for you!

DFr_95E842EC.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "I have a great product for you!"

DFr_9D725281.Text.Text: The product I’ve got here is Billy’s Deer Repellent.

DFr_9D725281.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "The product I’ve got here is Billy’..."

DFr_1DA8DD14.Text.Text: You need my product to do what it does!

DFr_1DA8DD14.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "You need my product to do what it d..."

DFr_A131BB6C.Text.Text: You need my product to protect you from the danger of deer!

DFr_A131BB6C.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "You need my product to protect you..."

DFr_19FC96B9.Text.Text: You don’t want those pests around!

DFr_19FC96B9.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "You don’t want those pests around!"

DFr_B9813B29.Text.Text: (Well there it is again, his pitch...)

DFr_B9813B29.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "(Well there it is again, his pitch...."

DFr_76EE71AC.Text.Text: (Still not making a whole lot of sense.)

DFr_76EE71AC.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "(Still not making a whole lot of se..."

DFr_5625328B.Text.Text: (Guess I should give it another look over... ^^^^^^^make sure I’ve clarified everything I can!)

DFr_5625328B.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "(Guess I should give it another loo..."

DFr_B3E0EE38.Text.Text: And what kind of product would that be, exactly?

DFr_B3E0EE38.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "And what kind of product would that..."

DFr_5BEA2181.Text.Text: I’m still not exactly sure what that is. Can you clarify for me?

DFr_5BEA2181.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "I’m still not exactly sure what tha..."

DFr_01C84B6E.Text.Text: Sure thing. You spray it, and it repels deer!

DFr_01C84B6E.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "Sure thing. You spray it, and it re..."

DFr_D572E678.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "...That’s why it’s called deer repe..."

DFr_5FCB7C93.Text.Text: (I should try to clarify some of his <color=#BB0000>other statements</color>, too.)

DFr_5FCB7C93.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "(I should try to clarify some of hi..."

DFr_BD5F1E71.Text.Text: Different statements will get different responses! Navigate with Next and Back!

DFr_FB8E1E0C.Text.Text: And what do you mean by that?

DFr_FB8E1E0C.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "And what do you mean by that?"

DFr_7D0A8DFD.Text.Text: It’s the best! ^^^^^It’s better than the rest!

DFr_BF8D32DC.Text.Text: ...It’s really good at doing what it does, ^^^^^Partner!

DFr_BF8D32DC.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "...It’s really good at doing what i..."

DFr_BC11BFDD.Text.Text: (I guess there’s no clarifying THIS bit of sales speak...)

DFr_BC11BFDD.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "(I guess there’s no clarifying THIS..."

DFr_5802F79D.Text.Text: Why, it only protects you from danger! ^^^The danger... ^^^^^of DEER!

DFr_5802F79D.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "Why, it only protects you from dang..."

DFr_E979728A.Text.Text: And trust me, you can use all the protection you can get...

DFr_E979728A.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "And trust me, you can use all the p..."

DFr_C0A8CECE.Text.Text: My product will protect you from deer!

DFr_C0A8CECE.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "My product will protect you from de..."

DFr_17F8F76F.Text.Text: It will keep deer from hurting you!

DFr_17F8F76F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "It will keep deer from hurting you!"

DFr_A830AEC6.Text.Text: What pests are you talking about?

DFr_A830AEC6.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "What pests are you talking about?"

DFr_32D94EE0.Text.Text: They are a menace, I tell ya! ^^^^^^^^^

DFr_32D94EE0.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/03_billy: "They are a menace, I tell ya! ^^^^^..."

DFr_84FE6578.Text.Text: Well, his argument’s much clearer now...

DFr_84FE6578.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "Well, his argument’s much clearer n..."

DFr_CD1E7DA3.Text.Text: ...Maybe I do need this deer repellent after all...

DFr_CD1E7DA3.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "...Maybe I do need this deer repell..."

DFr_F6F852E2.Text.Text: Dad, you can’t just let an argument go unexamined, no matter how clearly stated.

DFr_F6F852E2.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/02_ari: "Dad, you can’t just let an argument..."

DFr_D84169F6.Text.Text: Especially when someone’s trying to talk you into buying Deer Repellent!

DFr_E30EE700.Text.Text: But I got him to clarify everything... ^^^^What else is there to do?

DFr_E30EE700.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/01_socrates: "But I got him to clarify everything..."

DFr_617EF0CB.Text.Text: In a situation like this, if something seems to be on shaky ground, you need to <color=#BB0000>Press for Backing.</color>

DFr_617EF0CB.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/02_ari: "In a situation like this, if someth..."

DFr_E9ACF7E9.Text.Text: Make sure he can support his statements with foundational ideas!

DFr_E9ACF7E9.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s1_argument/02_ari: "Make sure he can support his statem..."

DFr_5DD534A2.Text.Text: Right! ^^^^^^^^Sorry, can I hear your pitch again?

DFr_C9E76996.Text.Text: The product I’ve got here is Billy’s Deer Repellent.

DFr_C9E76996.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "The product I’ve got here is Billy’..."

DFr_21CF8867.Text.Text: You need my product to protect you from the danger of deer!

DFr_21CF8867.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "You need my product to protect you..."

DFr_C88021AF.Text.Text: You don’t want those pests around!

DFr_C88021AF.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "You don’t want those pests around!"

DFr_905C7E2B.Text.Text: I’m still not exactly sure what that is. Can you clarify for me?

DFr_905C7E2B.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/01_socrates: "I’m still not exactly sure what tha..."

DFr_1FCF1B4D.Text.Text: Sure thing. You spray it, and it repels deer!

DFr_1FCF1B4D.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "Sure thing. You spray it, and it re..."

DFr_F462E594.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "...That’s why it’s called deer repe..."

DFr_C57D8918.Text.Text: And what do you mean by that?

DFr_C57D8918.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/01_socrates: "And what do you mean by that?"

DFr_AE8486B1.Text.Text: It’s the best! ^^^^^It’s better than the rest!

DFr_1C276324.Text.Text: ...It’s really good at doing what it does, ^^^^^Partner!

DFr_1C276324.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "...It’s really good at doing what i..."

DFr_48BAF4F2.Text.Text: (I guess there’s no clarifying THIS bit of sales speak...)

DFr_48BAF4F2.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/01_socrates: "(I guess there’s no clarifying THIS..."

DFr_462649E1.Text.Text: My product will protect you from deer!

DFr_462649E1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "My product will protect you from de..."

DFr_A527CFA3.Text.Text: It will keep deer from hurting you!

DFr_A527CFA3.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "It will keep deer from hurting you!"

DFr_1625EEF1.Text.Text: What pests are you talking about?

DFr_1625EEF1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/01_socrates: "What pests are you talking about?"

DFr_45F10C91.Text.Text: They are a menace, I tell ya! ^^^^^^^^^

DFr_45F10C91.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "They are a menace, I tell ya! ^^^^^..."

DFr_2D874D26.Text.Text: What evidence do you have to support that statement?

DFr_2D874D26.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/01_socrates: "What evidence do you have to suppor..."

DFr_2E22B94F.Text.Text: ...You see the bottles in my bag?

DFr_2E22B94F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "...You see the bottles in my bag?"

DFr_2A0F0B7A.Text.Text: They say “Billy’s Deer Repellent” on them.

DFr_8F88833A.Text.Text: I think it’s safe to say that’s the name of the product, don’t you?

DFr_8F88833A.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "I think it’s safe to say that’s the..."

DFr_8A0952C7.Text.Text: Can you back that statement up?

DFr_8A0952C7.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/01_socrates: "Can you back that statement up?"

DFr_2BD3449A.Text.Text: My product does everything better than competing products!

DFr_2BD3449A.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "My product does everything better t..."

DFr_FDD2E5A1.Text.Text: But that means, ^^^without a doubt, ^^^mine’s the best!

DFr_A6C5AB34.Text.Text: Hey! Maybe I should call it “Billy’s Best Deer Repellent!

DFr_A6C5AB34.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "Hey! Maybe I should call it “Billy’..."

DFr_FD3F8F48.Text.Text: Well, you never know when a deer will attack...

DFr_FD3F8F48.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "Well, you never know when a deer wi..."

DFr_EBF18A49.Text.Text: And if you don’t have my product, you’ll be in quite a predicament, Partner!

DFr_EBF18A49.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "And if you don’t have my product, y..."

DFr_B16DB5F1.Text.Text: Better to be safe than sorry!

DFr_B16DB5F1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "Better to be safe than sorry!"

DFr_29D8D1B3.Text.Text: I think I just did, Partner.

DFr_29D8D1B3.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "I think I just did, Partner."

DFr_EF340D33.Text.Text: Them bein’ a threat to society an’ all, I reckon this stands.

DFr_EF340D33.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "Them bein’ a threat to society an’..."

DFr_8D97434F.Text.Text: You don’t like keepin’ danger around, do ya?

DFr_8D97434F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "You don’t like keepin’ danger aroun..."

DFr_FA798A62.Text.Text: So this point is backed up by an earlier statement?

DFr_FA798A62.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/01_socrates: "So this point is backed up by an ea..."

DFr_AC963AD8.Text.Text: That’s right! As long as deer are dangerous, you don’t want them around!

DFr_AC963AD8.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "That’s right! As long as deer are d..."

DFr_A30F4814.Text.Text: Hold on, ^^^I’m not sure I buy this.

DFr_A30F4814.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/01_socrates: "Hold on, ^^^I’m not sure I buy this..."

DFr_126D23A7.Text.Text: Are you really trying to tell me Bambi poses a threat to my well-being?

DFr_126D23A7.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/01_socrates: "Are you really trying to tell me Ba..."

DFr_2DFB41F5.Text.Text: That’s going to take quite a bit of convincing.

DFr_2DFB41F5.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/01_socrates: "That’s going to take quite a bit of..."

DFr_FB961E19.Text.Text: He may look cute, but that deer’s a little monster!

DFr_FB961E19.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "He may look cute, but that deer’s a..."

DFr_CBD05EA4.Text.Text: Let me tell you why deer are a menace to our society...

DFr_CBD05EA4.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a2/03_billy: "Let me tell you why deer are a mena..."

DFr_806F1F5F.Text.Text: Every year they cause accidents and injuries!

DFr_806F1F5F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3_presentation/03_billy: "Every year they cause accidents and..."

DFr_BCD4D4E1.Text.Text: Why, the only reason you’re safe is that I’m here with my repellent!

DFr_BCD4D4E1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3_presentation/03_billy: "Why, the only reason you’re safe is..."

DFr_152F6BBF.Text.Text: And there we go! ^^^^^As you can see, those darn deer threaten our very way of life!!

DFr_152F6BBF.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/03_billy: "And there we go! ^^^^^As you can se..."

DFr_C100E0D5.Text.Text: Hmm... ^^^a threat, ^^^huh? ^^^^^I’m not sure if everything you’ve said here is true.

DFr_73457518.Text.Text: You know Dad, ^^^^^in a debate you can do more than just ask questions.

DFr_73457518.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/02_ari: "You know Dad, ^^^^^in a debate you..."

DFr_5110C1AC.Text.Text: In fact, sometimes that just won’t cut it.

DFr_5110C1AC.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/02_ari: "In fact, sometimes that just won’t..."

DFr_78F47DBF.Text.Text: Sometimes, ^^^you may need to <color=#BB0000>Challenge</color> your opponent with a counterpoint!

DFr_D039A324.Text.Text: Some fact or observation which throws a wrench in the presumption his statement is true.

DFr_D039A324.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/02_ari: "Some fact or observation which thro..."

DFr_049522E3.Text.Text: For example, the fact “Deer live in the woods” might throw a wrench in one of Billy’s statements here.

DFr_049522E3.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/02_ari: "For example, the fact “Deer live in..."

DFr_0F45499B.Text.Text: If you find that statement, and present this observation to counter it, you should be home free!

DFr_0F45499B.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/02_ari: "If you find that statement, and pre..."

DFr_F291AD13.Text.Text: When you get a useful idea, ^^^I’ll write it down for you in the “Idea Slate.”

DFr_F291AD13.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/02_ari: "When you get a useful idea, ^^^I’ll..."

DFr_1423F098.Text.Text: You can now “Challenge” your opponent’s moves.

DFr_4C0347C7.Text.Text: “Deer Live in the Woods” added to the Idea Slate.

DFr_4C0347C7.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/12_notification: "“Deer Live in the Woods” added to t..."

DFr_29F3B7E3.Text.Text: Oh, all right, ^^^I’ll go ahead and do that then, ^^^^^I guess.

DFr_29F3B7E3.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/01_socrates: "Oh, all right, ^^^I’ll go ahead and..."

DFr_AF8C170F.Text.Text: You need to be careful though, Dad.

DFr_AF8C170F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/02_ari: "You need to be careful though, Dad."

DFr_0662535F.Text.Text: If you say really stupid things, ^^^you’ll lose credibility with your audience.

DFr_0662535F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/02_ari: "If you say really stupid things, ^^..."

DFr_9BF34D6D.Text.Text: From now on, your moves can affect your CREDIBILITY.

DFr_9BF34D6D.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/12_notification: "From now on, your moves can affect..."

DFr_3A05E406.Text.Text: If you lose all of your CREDIBILITY, you will forfeit the argument!

DFr_3A05E406.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/12_notification: "If you lose all of your CREDIBILITY..."

DFr_9E972760.Text.Text: But wait! ^^^^^Hold on, ^^^^I’m just fact-checking a salesman! ^^^^^Who am I going to lose credibility with?

DFr_CA0662DA.Text.Text: “Your Face is Ugly!” added to the Idea Slate.

DFr_CA0662DA.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p3/12_notification: "“Your Face is Ugly!” added to the I..."

DFr_845BDB9A.Text.Text: Every year they cause accidents and injuries!

DFr_845BDB9A.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Every year they cause accidents and..."

DFr_DCD22248.Text.Text: Why, the only reason you’re safe is that I’m here with my repellent!

DFr_DCD22248.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Why, the only reason you’re safe is..."

DFr_97D3E294.Text.Text: What do you mean by that?

DFr_97D3E294.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "What do you mean by that?"

DFr_997E3AA8.Text.Text: Deer eat the plants farmers grow!

DFr_997E3AA8.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Deer eat the plants farmers grow!"

DFr_FD5481EC.Text.Text: A deer could eat a whole bushel of corn without breakin’ a sweat!

DFr_FD5481EC.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "A deer could eat a whole bushel of..."

DFr_38DA1988.Text.Text: What evidence do you have to back that up?

DFr_38DA1988.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "What evidence do you have to back t..."

DFr_298B0B86.Text.Text: Do you know what deer are, Partner?!

DFr_298B0B86.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Do you know what deer are, Partner?..."

DFr_8767CA61.Text.Text: That means they eat plants! ^^^^^Lots of ‘em.

DFr_E8A7BE95.Text.Text: Well, ^^^crops are plants. ^^^^^^So those darn deer will eat ‘em.

DFr_A499E26E.Text.Text: How can they do that if they live in the woods?

DFr_A499E26E.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "How can they do that if they live i..."

DFr_C331C7FD.Text.Text: Just because they live in the woods, ^^^^doesn’t mean they don’t wander, ^^^^Partner.

DFr_C331C7FD.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Just because they live in the woods..."

DFr_EFA4585B.Text.Text: Farms are rural, ^^^^^^meanin’ very little stands between them and the livelyhood of hard workin’ farmers.

DFr_61429129.Text.Text: There’s no buildings, ^^^^^no highways... ^^^^^nothin’ to stop ‘em.

DFr_B8251E7F.Text.Text: My dear grandma could tell y’all all about it. ^^^^^Deer almost ate her out of house and home!

DFr_B8251E7F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "My dear grandma could tell y’all al..."

DFr_A38D721F.Text.Text: Well... Well, your face is ugly!

DFr_A38D721F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Well... Well, your face is ugly!"

DFr_C850DEB9.Text.Text: Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?

DFr_C850DEB9.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?"

DFr_59C80B99.Text.Text: Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feelings.

DFr_59C80B99.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feeling..."

DFr_1C5D3CFD.Text.Text: Sorry! Don’t know what came over me...

DFr_1C5D3CFD.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Sorry! Don’t know what came over me..."

DFr_0391E6D2.Text.Text: What do you mean by that?

DFr_0391E6D2.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "What do you mean by that?"

DFr_CE726F92.Text.Text: Deer take jobs from the working man!

DFr_CE726F92.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Deer take jobs from the working man..."

DFr_A11C606C.Text.Text: Companies hire them instead of normal folks!

DFr_A11C606C.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Companies hire them instead of norm..."

DFr_80D3AEE3.Text.Text: Cheap labor. ^^^^You only need to pay them in leaves!

DFr_80D3AEE3.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Cheap labor. ^^^^You only need to p..."

DFr_7F71AA87.Text.Text: Really? And how exactly do they do that?

DFr_7F71AA87.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Really? And how exactly do they do..."

DFr_5AB548E8.Text.Text: Okay, they don’t actually steal our jobs.

DFr_5AB548E8.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Okay, they don’t actually steal our..."

DFr_F8A3E526.Text.Text: They can’t steal our jobs because they live in the woods!

DFr_F8A3E526.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "They can’t steal our jobs because t..."

DFr_94D8DD95.Text.Text: But I don’t think them living in the woods is the root of the problem here.

DFr_94D8DD95.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/02_ari: "But I don’t think them living in th..."

DFr_C2BE7DA1.Text.Text: In fact, ^^^^^taking this approach implies you ACCEPT deer could steal our jobs.

DFr_7ABD5746.Text.Text: Just because you can present a counterpoint doesn’t mean that’s the best angle of attack. ^^^^^You can probably do something else to refute this praticular idea.

DFr_7ABD5746.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/02_ari: "Just because you can present a coun..."

DFr_B319E617.Text.Text: Can you clarify that for me?

DFr_B319E617.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Can you clarify that for me?"

DFr_96FCB0B3.Text.Text: Do you know what an injury is?

DFr_96FCB0B3.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Do you know what an injury is?"

DFr_18E2284C.Text.Text: Then I think my statement is pretty clear, Partner.

DFr_18E2284C.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Then I think my statement is pretty..."

DFr_0436E924.Text.Text: Do you have any evidence to support that deer cause injuries?

DFr_0436E924.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Do you have any evidence to support..."

DFr_457AA7B6.Text.Text: Have you ever heard of the term ^^^^^^^“deer in the headlights?

DFr_457AA7B6.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Have you ever heard of the term ^^^..."

DFr_BB7E75A8.Text.Text: Well, ^^^^turns out that term comes from real life deer!

DFr_F4D19FF1.Text.Text: They stand in the middle of the road and just get hit.

DFr_F4D19FF1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "They stand in the middle of the roa..."

DFr_27BDC17A.Text.Text: Causes all sorts of horrible crashes.

DFr_27BDC17A.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Causes all sorts of horrible crashe..."

DFr_C0464CEC.Text.Text: This is what’s wrong with your argument!

DFr_C0464CEC.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "This is what’s wrong with your argu..."

DFr_0F5E3F5F.Text.Text: Uh, I don’t really think that flies.

DFr_0F5E3F5F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Uh, I don’t really think that flies..."

DFr_814672D0.Text.Text: Dad! That’s not a relevant counterpoint to this premise!

DFr_814672D0.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/02_ari: "Dad! That’s not a relevant counterp..."

DFr_C754C295.Text.Text: What do you mean by that?

DFr_C754C295.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "What do you mean by that?"

DFr_DCB56A3C.Text.Text: If I wasn’t here, this street would be swarming with deer!

DFr_DCB56A3C.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "If I wasn’t here, this street would..."

DFr_2A080546.Text.Text: Why, it’s too horrible to even comprehend.

DFr_2A080546.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Why, it’s too horrible to even comp..."

DFr_865F5CB1.Text.Text: How can you be so sure?

DFr_865F5CB1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "How can you be so sure?"

DFr_B19F59DA.Text.Text: Tell me, Partner... ^^^^do you see any deer around?

DFr_7BB39D5C.Text.Text: There you go! ^^^^My Deer Repellent at work!

DFr_DE8940F6.Text.Text: And less you can give me a reason to doubt it, I see no reason anyone should think otherwise.

DFr_DE8940F6.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "And less you can give me a reason t..."

DFr_F495FACB.Text.Text: Dad, do you think you could oblige him?

DFr_F495FACB.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/02_ari: "Dad, do you think you could oblige..."

DFr_F9E666F1.Text.Text: You have something which throws one of his statements into question, Dad.

DFr_F9E666F1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/02_ari: "You have something which throws one..."

DFr_F0C6B12F.Text.Text: Just point it out and you’ll be good to go!

DFr_F0C6B12F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/02_ari: "Just point it out and you’ll be goo..."

DFr_4677766A.Text.Text: Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feelings.

DFr_4677766A.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feeling..."

DFr_911D54C5.Text.Text: Sorry! Don’t know what came over me...

DFr_911D54C5.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Sorry! Don’t know what came over me..."

DFr_D05E0815.Text.Text: Well... Well, your face is ugly!

DFr_D05E0815.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Well... Well, your face is ugly!"

DFr_DDB9F325.Text.Text: Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?

DFr_DDB9F325.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?"

DFr_A6B9E2D5.Text.Text: Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feelings.

DFr_A6B9E2D5.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feeling..."

DFr_5316C12B.Text.Text: Sorry! Don’t know what came over me...

DFr_5316C12B.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Sorry! Don’t know what came over me..."

DFr_2BAFEF48.Text.Text: Well... Well, your face is ugly!

DFr_2BAFEF48.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Well... Well, your face is ugly!"

DFr_87C5C650.Text.Text: Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?

DFr_87C5C650.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?"

DFr_385A8BE5.Text.Text: Well... Well, your face is ugly!

DFr_385A8BE5.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Well... Well, your face is ugly!"

DFr_CE80A016.Text.Text: Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?

DFr_CE80A016.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?"

DFr_13EE8DF1.Text.Text: Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feelings.

DFr_13EE8DF1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/03_billy: "Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feeling..."

DFr_532E3938.Text.Text: Sorry! Don’t know what came over me...

DFr_532E3938.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_a3_argument/01_socrates: "Sorry! Don’t know what came over me..."

DFr_D54C496F.Text.Text: Uhhh... forests, mountains, and plains, I reckon. ^^^^^^Right?

DFr_9080CD88.Text.Text: That sounds about right. ^^^And where are we now?

DFr_DD66EC31.Text.Text: ^^^^^Billy... ^^^^^^^^Can you tell me where deer most commonly reside?

DFr_F473F16F.Text.Text: When was the last time you heard of a deer in New York City?!

DFr_F473F16F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_socrates_nonsense/01_socrates: "When was the last time you heard of..."

DFr_C0D576F3.Text.Text: It’s highly unlikely a deer will show up in any city, ^^^^^let alone in New York!

DFr_C0D576F3.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_socrates_nonsense/01_socrates: "It’s highly unlikely a deer will sh..."

DFr_0ED5F162.Text.Text: Do you really think you can take credit for the fact there are no deer around?!

DFr_0ED5F162.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_socrates_nonsense/01_socrates: "Do you really think you can take cr..."

DFr_105F1E47.Text.Text: Maybe if we were living in the wilderness, we would need your deer repellent...

DFr_105F1E47.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_socrates_nonsense/01_socrates: "Maybe if we were living in the wild..."

DFr_10236710.Text.Text: But as we live in the middle of a city, ^^^I hardly see the point!

DFr_10236710.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_socrates_nonsense/01_socrates: "But as we live in the middle of a c..."

DFr_7AD2C3E2.Text.Text: I highly doubt Bambi is going to wander down Main Street! ^^^^^He’d be hit in an instant!

DFr_7AD2C3E2.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_socrates_nonsense/01_socrates: "I highly doubt Bambi is going to wa..."

DFr_75BCD298.Text.Text: Clearly, your repellent is of no use!

DFr_75BCD298.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_socrates_nonsense/01_socrates: "Clearly, your repellent is of no us..."

DFr_276B6D3E.Text.Text: So I hardly think I need to buy— ^^^^^^^^^^

DFr_276B6D3E.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_socrates_nonsense/01_socrates: "So I hardly think I need to buy— ^^..."

DFr_AD06AC2F.Text.Text: Now listen here, Mister. It seems to me y’all are bein’ unfair.

DFr_AD06AC2F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_billy_nonsense/03_billy: "Now listen here, Mister. It seems t..."

DFr_231385B0.Text.Text: I’ll admit you have a point, ^^^but you are failin’ to consider all the finer qualities of this here product.

DFr_231385B0.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_billy_nonsense/03_billy: "I’ll admit you have a point, ^^^but..."

DFr_2914DD9D.Text.Text: ...Let me explain to you what y’all are missin’. ^^^^^Why my product is still useful to ya!

DFr_2914DD9D.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s5_billy_nonsense/03_billy: "...Let me explain to you what y’all..."

DFr_0DFF56D5.Text.Text: My product comes in a fine blue casing!

DFr_0DFF56D5.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_1/03_billy: "My product comes in a fine blue cas..."

DFr_70D203FD.Text.Text: Each letter of the label is hand painted!

DFr_70D203FD.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_1/03_billy: "Each letter of the label is hand pa..."

DFr_CD15B8EA.Text.Text: My grandma toiled over the design!

DFr_CD15B8EA.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_1/03_billy: "My grandma toiled over the design!"

DFr_5829A4EC.Text.Text: Clearly, my product would still be useful to you!

DFr_5829A4EC.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_1/03_billy: "Clearly, my product would still be..."

DFr_3E019EE9.Text.Text: Ari, I don’t think I have any evidence to counter these points!

DFr_3E019EE9.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_2/01_socrates: "Ari, I don’t think I have any evide..."

DFr_0C05CE70.Text.Text: You know, even if a point is supported, it may not be related to the conclusion.

DFr_0C05CE70.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_2/02_ari: "You know, even if a point is suppor..."

DFr_ED258406.Text.Text: If that’s the case, it really doesn’t matter if it’s supported or not.

DFr_ED258406.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_2/02_ari: "If that’s the case, it really doesn..."

DFr_6815D616.Text.Text: The point has no place being presented in the discussion.

DFr_6815D616.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_2/02_ari: "The point has no place being presen..."

DFr_E3ECE84A.Text.Text: You’re saying in such situations... I should <color=#BB0000>Question Relevance</color> for the statement?

DFr_5ECD9458.Text.Text: Well, that’s what John Stuart Mill would do.

DFr_5ECD9458.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_2/02_ari: "Well, that’s what John Stuart Mill..."

DFr_4E99C297.Text.Text: It’s not useful for us to listen to statements that have no connection to the overall argument.

DFr_4E99C297.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_2/02_ari: "It’s not useful for us to listen to..."

DFr_15275D3E.Text.Text: If we’re discussing economics, for example, it really doesn’t matter how well you support the fact purple is the best color.

DFr_7D1DF5D5.Text.Text: Of course not. ^^^^^We all know green is, anyway.

DFr_7D1DF5D5.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_2/01_socrates: "Of course not. ^^^^^We all know gre..."

DFr_6B8895C5.Text.Text: Even if the statement is relevant, questioning can be a great way to see how everything fits together!

DFr_6B8895C5.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_2/02_ari: "Even if the statement is relevant,..."

DFr_B6DA7692.Text.Text: (I guess I should go forward with questioning him, then...)

DFr_B6DA7692.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_dialogue_2/01_socrates: "(I guess I should go forward with q..."

DFr_3B1035DC.Text.Text: My product comes in a fine blue casing!

DFr_3B1035DC.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "My product comes in a fine blue cas..."

DFr_F8BA01AF.Text.Text: What do you mean by that?

DFr_F8BA01AF.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "What do you mean by that?"

DFr_70688123.Text.Text: Didn’t they teach you anything in school?

DFr_70688123.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Didn’t they teach you anything in s..."

DFr_CB0B1825.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "...Can you see these canisters here..."

DFr_D59E1D28.Text.Text: Well, ^^^^^^there we go. ^^^^^^^Was that so hard?

DFr_351EEA72.Text.Text: How is this related to your conclusion?

DFr_351EEA72.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "How is this related to your conclus..."

DFr_BC2B9416.Text.Text: Therefore... ^^^the fact my product is pretty... ^^^^makes it... ^^^^^more useful?

DFr_307F0084.Text.Text: Each letter of the label is hand painted!

DFr_307F0084.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Each letter of the label is hand pa..."

DFr_2DF7A8C1.Text.Text: Uh, I don’t really think that flies.

DFr_2DF7A8C1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Uh, I don’t really think that flies..."

DFr_1138624E.Text.Text: Dad! That’s not a relevant counterpoint to this premise!

DFr_1138624E.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/02_ari: "Dad! That’s not a relevant counterp..."

DFr_C3E0CCB4.Text.Text: What do you mean by this?

DFr_7BA10264.Text.Text: How is this related to your conclusion?

DFr_7BA10264.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "How is this related to your conclus..."

DFr_239795A0.Text.Text: I mean I picked up a paintbrush and painted ‘em on myself.

DFr_239795A0.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "I mean I picked up a paintbrush and..."

DFr_9FDAFA9F.Text.Text: I always fancied myself a bit of an artist. ^^^^^I have an exhibit at the Guggenheim!

DFr_9FDAFA9F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "I always fancied myself a bit of an..."

DFr_7CFDCB50.Text.Text: But I dreamed I did once...

DFr_7CFDCB50.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "But I dreamed I did once..."

DFr_9A60CDF7.Text.Text: If you line these cans up, you’ll see they’re all different!

DFr_9A60CDF7.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "If you line these cans up, you’ll s..."

DFr_03CC9376.Text.Text: And things being done by machine? ^^^^^^^^That’s not craftsmanship.

DFr_03CC9376.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "And things being done by machine? ^..."

DFr_E51E2A4C.Text.Text: Okay, ^^^^^great... ^^^^^^^but how does this “craftmanship” make your product more useful?

DFr_6DA1E555.Text.Text: Okay, ^^^fine, ^^^^you made your point. Let’s move on.

DFr_EADB7B0F.Text.Text: My grandma toiled over the design!

DFr_EADB7B0F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "My grandma toiled over the design!"

DFr_1FEDE626.Text.Text: This is what’s wrong with your argument!

DFr_E67A6C3D.Text.Text: Uh, I don’t really think that flies.

DFr_E67A6C3D.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Uh, I don’t really think that flies..."

DFr_C90B2D1B.Text.Text: Dad! That’s not a relevant counterpoint to this premise!

DFr_C90B2D1B.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/02_ari: "Dad! That’s not a relevant counterp..."

DFr_BABA2BA8.Text.Text: What do you mean by this?

DFr_BABA2BA8.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "What do you mean by this?"

DFr_510BA58B.Text.Text: My grandma spent hours designing this for me!

DFr_510BA58B.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "My grandma spent hours designing th..."

DFr_0D393E7A.Text.Text: That’s why it’s so darn pretty!

DFr_0D393E7A.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "That’s why it’s so darn pretty!"

DFr_AC2E1649.Text.Text: You would question the honesty of an old lady?!

DFr_5D42F4FF.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Surely the amount of time my gran p..."

DFr_CB743883.Text.Text: ACK! ^^^^^^^^^Heartless! ^^^Just heartless... ^^^^^^^no respect for the elderly.

DFr_13039EAE.Text.Text: Clearly, my product would still be useful to you!

DFr_03B91DE1.Text.Text: Uh, I don’t really think that flies.

DFr_03B91DE1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Uh, I don’t really think that flies..."

DFr_A6E4FC15.Text.Text: Dad! That’s not a relevant counterpoint to this premise!

DFr_A6E4FC15.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/02_ari: "Dad! That’s not a relevant counterp..."

DFr_4B36B173.Text.Text: What do you mean by this?

DFr_4B36B173.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "What do you mean by this?"

DFr_F2E56108.Text.Text: It’s a regular Mona Lisa! It’s pretty!

DFr_F2E56108.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "It’s a regular Mona Lisa! It’s pret..."

DFr_1E514A26.Text.Text: Every little detail before this point... ^^^that’s why my product would be of use to you!

DFr_1E514A26.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Every little detail before this poi..."

DFr_0A26D3C0.Text.Text: How is this related to your conclusion?

DFr_0A26D3C0.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "How is this related to your conclus..."

DFr_3A46DD26.Text.Text: For all the reasons I just gave, ^^^my product is of great use!

DFr_3A46DD26.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "For all the reasons I just gave, ^^..."

DFr_21FFF2EB.Text.Text: And as long as those stand strong, ^^^I don’t think you can really question it

DFr_21FFF2EB.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "And as long as those stand strong,..."

DFr_C50E8B7E.Text.Text: This is what’s wrong with your argument!

DFr_C50E8B7E.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "This is what’s wrong with your argu..."

DFr_1042D212.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Uh, I don’t really think that flies..."

DFr_C5E29F99.Text.Text: Well... Well, your face is ugly!

DFr_C5E29F99.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "Well... Well, your face is ugly!"

DFr_D3DBDFC7.Text.Text: Sorry! Don’t know what came over me...

DFr_D3DBDFC7.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "Sorry! Don’t know what came over me..."

DFr_23B0B897.Text.Text: Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feelings.

DFr_23B0B897.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feeling..."

DFr_7FB93665.Text.Text: Dad! That’s not a relevant counterpoint to this premise!

DFr_7FB93665.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/02_ari: "Dad! That’s not a relevant counterp..."

DFr_C82C274A.Text.Text: Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?

DFr_C4E4F9A9.Text.Text: Well, then what’s holding you up?

DFr_444D3EC5.Text.Text: Sorry! Don’t know what came over me...

DFr_444D3EC5.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "Sorry! Don’t know what came over me..."

DFr_36168DC3.Text.Text: Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feelings.

DFr_36168DC3.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feeling..."

DFr_4283C35D.Text.Text: Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?

DFr_4283C35D.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?"

DFr_714EBF29.Text.Text: Well... Well, your face is ugly!

DFr_714EBF29.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "Well... Well, your face is ugly!"

DFr_DC431FAB.Text.Text: Sorry! Don’t know what came over me...

DFr_DC431FAB.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "Sorry! Don’t know what came over me..."

DFr_2515F7C1.Text.Text: Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feelings.

DFr_2515F7C1.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feeling..."

DFr_1E0B4B28.Text.Text: Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?

DFr_1E0B4B28.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?"

DFr_81E199C9.Text.Text: Well... Well, your face is ugly!

DFr_81E199C9.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "Well... Well, your face is ugly!"

DFr_9EDA6AB0.Text.Text: Sorry! Don’t know what came over me...

DFr_9EDA6AB0.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/01_socrates: "Sorry! Don’t know what came over me..."

DFr_F9155C88.Text.Text: Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feelings.

DFr_F9155C88.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Now you’ve gone an’ hurt my feeling..."

DFr_D2D84BD3.Text.Text: Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?

DFr_D2D84BD3.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p4_argument/03_billy: "Aw, wha’d you go an’ say that for?"

DFr_468E19EE.Text.Text: Oh, the yelling... ^^^it’s too much for my heart to bear...

DFr_D06C1DE9.Text.Text: Relax. I’m not going to hurt you. ^^^^^^Just your sales pitch.

DFr_D06C1DE9.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/01_socrates: "Relax. I’m not going to hurt you. ^..."

DFr_A8E2997C.Text.Text: Well, I’m afraid there is no avoiding it.

DFr_A8E2997C.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/01_socrates: "Well, I’m afraid there is no avoidi..."

DFr_DC1605AB.Text.Text: Billy, you are trying to sell me a product based on its usefulness to me..."

DFr_DC1605AB.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/01_socrates: "Billy, you are trying to sell me a..."

DFr_2300708C.Text.Text: But its aesthetic qualities and methods of manufacturing, ^^^^while nice, ^^^^^offer no function which benefits me!

DFr_2300708C.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/01_socrates: "But its aesthetic qualities and met..."

DFr_C5D90326.Text.Text: At this point, you are grasping at straws to convince me to buy your product, ^^^^^and you know it!

DFr_C5D90326.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/01_socrates: "At this point, you are grasping at..."

DFr_4B036217.Text.Text: It’s been nice chatting with you, but I’ve got clients to find.

DFr_4B036217.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/03_billy: "It’s been nice chatting with you, b..."

DFr_B65B1887.Text.Text: There are many fish in the sea, and it’s clear you ain’t one of mine.

DFr_B65B1887.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/03_billy: "There are many fish in the sea, and..."

DFr_93391097.Text.Text: Fun?! ^^^I think you mean infuriating. ^^^^^^...How much time do you have left before school?

DFr_DBF1B497.Text.Text: Relax, ^^^Dad, ^^^I’m sure I’m fine. ^^^^^^We still have...

DFr_10512F87.Text.Text: ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^I can’t believe we lost track of time! ^^^^^^^It’s all that fool Billy’s fault! ^^^^^^^Billy and his idiotic Deer Repellent! ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

DFr_BBC4C12C.Text.Text: Now you’re going to be late for school, ^^^^^^^and you’ll probably be expelled, ^^^^^^^and your mother will never forgive me, ^^^^^^^not that she talks to me anymore anyway... ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

DFr_BBC4C12C.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/01_socrates: "Now you’re going to be late for sch..."

DFr_5184D524.Text.Text: “The best of its kind.” HAH! But it’s not competing with anything. ^^^^^I mean, what would it compete with? Harry’s Deer Vanisher? ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

DFr_5184D524.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/01_socrates: "“The best of its kind.” HAH! But it..."

DFr_07BA70A2.Text.Text: Honestly, people believe they can sell you on anything these days, wasting our time. The nerve! They think we’re a bunch of fools— ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

DFr_07BA70A2.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/01_socrates: "Honestly, people believe they can s..."

DFr_8CBAAC0C.Text.Text: — and we can just be convinced we should buy a stupid product we’ll never, ever, need. I mean, aesthetic qualities, I ask you... ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

DFr_8CBAAC0C.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_s6/01_socrates: "— and we can just be convinced we s..."

DFr_64B3E09F.Text.Text: Listen, Partner, ^^^I appreciate the interrogation, ^^I really do... ^^^^^^^^^^but my time is tickin’, ^^^as they say.

DFr_C1683360.Text.Text: Oh, come on, Ari! ^^^^^^Have you been listening to him? ^^^^^^^^^

DFr_C1683360.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_gameower/01_socrates: "Oh, come on, Ari! ^^^^^^Have you be..."

DFr_326AC7B7.Text.Text: What are we going to do if a deer attacks?

DFr_326AC7B7.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_gameower/01_socrates: "What are we going to do if a deer a..."

DFr_3BEEAF7B.Text.Text: I^^^^^^^^^^ don’t believe this. ^^^^^You are dead to me.

DFr_0EC8EB4F.Text.Text: I’m never speaking to you again!

DFr_0EC8EB4F.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_gameower/02_ari: "I’m never speaking to you again!"

DFr_D476AEEB.Text.Text: how much will you be buying?

DFr_D476AEEB.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_gameower/03_billy: "how much will you be buying?"

DFr_1A17C07C.Text.Text: (Well, uh, ^^^^^^^I wound up buying ALL of the deer repellent.)

DFr_FD37ADB6.Text.Text: (...And nothing was really learned that day.)

DFr_2F8CBCBD.Text.Text: So I’m going to need a decision, ^^^^^soon. ^^^^^^^^I need to be on my way.

DFr_2F8CBCBD.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_gameower/03_billy: "So I’m going to need a decision, ^^..."

DFr_AF642F8A.Text.Text: Horsefeathers!! ^^^^^^I told you my product was the best, didn’t I? ^^^^^^^^What more do you need to know?

DFr_FCEF0799.Text.Text: Ariadne Jones, ^^this is all your fault! ^^^^^He didn’t tell me anything!

DFr_FCEF0799.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p1_1/01_socrates: "Ariadne Jones, ^^this is all your f..."

DFr_B282A102.Text.Text: Well, generally, one goes about getting more information by asking questions.

DFr_B282A102.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p1_1/02_ari: "Well, generally, one goes about get..."

DFr_067FC5BA.Text.Text: In this case, ^^^it’s probably most appropriate to ^^^^<color=#BB0000>Ask for Clarification</color>.

DFr_EEB732CB.Text.Text: If you can clear up any vagueness surrounding his ideas, ^^^you’ll be in a much better position to deal with them.

DFr_EEB732CB.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p1_1/02_ari: "If you can clear up any vagueness s..."

DFr_B2B56BD9.Text.Text: Good! ^^^^^Most arguments are made out of multiple statements. ^^^^Be sure to check them all for anything that seems vague.

DFr_D16CE66B.Text.Text: So what do you think, Partner? ^^^You buying?

DFr_D16CE66B.Text.Context: Flow/prologue_p1_1/03_billy: "So what do you think, Partner? ^^^Y..."

DFr_0515766F.Text.Text: Actually, ^^^^^could I hear your pitch again?

Hub_1AE73A87.idea.ideaDescription.Text: My opponent only believes what he does because his face looks like a baboon’s backside.

Hub_A7BB7170.idea.ideaDescription.Text: Deer are most commonly found in large, wooded areas, away from the bustle of people.
